thread.title: Carhartt WIP Heads to Joshua Tree for SS17 Editorial
thread.title_full: Carhartt WIP Heads to Joshua Tree for SS17 Editorial

author: Kam Dhillon
title: Carhartt WIP Heads to Joshua Tree for SS17 Editorial
text:
Visit the original post to see all 11 images from this gallery. 
Location: Joshua Tree, CA.
Season: Spring/Summer 2017
Key Looks: Camo chore jackets, light graphic T-shirts and warmer pieces (that you definitely wouldn’t take to the desert) such as bomber jackets with some subtly textured treatment.
Editor’s Notes: A landscape of flat, harsh sunlight, cracked land, cacti, canyons, and wind-worn rock formations bring a new edge to a strong collection of workwear-inspired pieces. It’s a cool contrast to the brand’s SS17 lookbook that was shot against an industrial, urban backdrop. The winding dunes of sand and clear blue sky of Joshua Tree definitely provide a solid sense of fantasy.

For more fashion news, get a gritty glimpse of Australian surf subculture in TCSS’s SS17 lookbook.
